title: Greta Van Susteren - Wikipedia
snippet: Greta Conway Van Susteren (born June 11, 1954) is an American journalist, lawyer, and television news anchor for Newsmax TV. She was previously on CNN, Fox News, and MSNBC. She hosted Fox News's On the Record w/ Greta Van Susteren for 14 years (2002–2016) before departing for MSNBC, where ...

title: Greta Van Susteren Will Join Newsmax Early-Evening Lineup in June
snippet: Greta Van Susteren will join conservative news outlet Newsmax as an early evening anchor in June.

title: Greta Van Susteren
snippet: Former Fox News Star Greta Van Susteren Moves To MSNBC Former Fox News star Greta Van Susteren will debut on MSNBC next week with For the Record with Greta.

title: Greta Van Susteren – USC Center on Communication Leadership and Policy
snippet: While working for Gray TV, Greta simultaneously anchored Voice of America’s weekly television program Plugged In which covered foreign policy, US domestic affairs, and broadcasted worldwide in 48 languages.

title: Greta Van Susteren Signs Multi-Year Renewal with Newsmax | Newsmax Media, Inc.
